long_description: With the Outbound Stainless-Steel Camp Toaster, you can enjoy a hearty breakfast that includes perfectly toasted bread even while you're car camping. Place the toaster over a burner on your campstove; cooks 4 pieces of toast at a time. Conveniently folds flat to store. Closeout.
short_description: With the Outbound Stainless-Steel Camp Toaster, you can enjoy a hearty breakfast that includes perfectly toasted bread even while you're car camping.
